vote.title: Appointment of Danielle Dillard, 1118 Geers Avenue, Columbus, OH 43206, to serve on the Livingston Avenue Area Commission, replacing George Holliman, with a new term start date of January 1, 2025 and an expiration date of December 31, 2027 (resume attached).

Appointment of Danielle Dillard, 1118 Geers Avenue, Columbus, OH 43206, to serve on the Livingston Avenue Area Commission, replacing George Holliman, with a new term start date of January 1, 2025 and an expiration date of December 31, 2027 (resume attached).
